about_me: I am a second-year student majoring in computer science in Polish Japanese Academy of Information Technology in Gdańsk. I am interested in data science and machine learning to solve real-world problems and even though I am still relatively new to the field, I am eager to gain hands-on experience and apply my skills in a real-world setting.
